title: Motion Design: firey lettering
content: Enjoy this piece on Vimeo from Kathrin Schindler. Added to the [Typophile Group on Vimeo](http://web.archive.org/web/20090429081632/http:/www.vimeo.com/groups/typophile)
author: Joe Pemberton

comments.content: This reminds me of the recent eye article suggesting that we are all craving & responding to design that makes use of the obviously non digital eg the actual and physical. There were a number of nice examples. This example fits with that argument nicely. Oh, and I liked it...
